title: the support item changes at least fix abuse
body:
There will no longer be mid laners, junglers and nasus/GP going {{item:3303}} or {{item:3301}}. And no more adc {{item:3302}} abuse

In the long run this will probably be a good thing, especially for ADC's. Who really don't need to get their cheap items 500-1000 gold faster

replies.body: Glad we're fixing ADC's with {{item:3302}} at the cost of taking its usefulness away from tank supports.
I agree it will fix {{item:3097}}, and maybe {{item:3303}}, but I am not so sure about the coin. Does anyone build coin for the current quest reward?
